title: switch() Changed Comparison Style
description: The switch command uses a relaxed comparison style. Hence, the associated cases changed in PHP 8.0, whenever they use the special values such a 0, empty string '' or null.
code:
<?php

$a = 0;
switch ($a) {
	case 'a': 
		print 'a'.PHP_EOL;
		break;

	case 0: 
		print 'Null'.PHP_EOL;
		break;
		
	default:
		print 'Default'.PHP_EOL;
}

?>
